meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>enter</kanji> a <kanji>group</kanji>, it's called <vocabulary>enrollment</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>enlistment</vocabulary>. You're <vocabulary>joining</vocabulary> the group.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
